extendedInfo.description: Insight Timer can help with your meditation practice by allowing you to focus inward, instead of on the clock.  Beautiful Tibetan singing bowl sounds will peacefully and serenely guide you though your meditation session. With the Insight Connect community, you see others around the world who are meditating with you - including your friends.  There are over 100 groups for various practices to help you connect with others who share your spiritual path.Insight Timer is the world's most popular meditation timer app.  Insight Timer has been featured in US News & World Report, Forbes Magazine, Men's Journal Magazine, The Washington Post, Los Angeles Times and O, The Oprah Magazine.* * * * * * * * * *+ Now with guided meditations (Android 3.1+ only)+ Please note that the video demonstrates the full version of the app.  This free version doesn't have all of the features shown (though the Insight Connect part is the same).+ Includes an optional daily meditation reminder

reviews.title: Nice and simple
reviews.comment: I am only using the free version, but I like that you an see who is meditating worldwide and I like that it keeps track of your stats.
reviews.author: Kelsi Singer

reviews.title: Helpful, easy, fun
reviews.comment: Helpful, easy, fun
reviews.author: Tanya Huey

reviews.title: A shining jewel
reviews.comment: Really supports my own practice and has been a great way to introduce friends to meditation.  So many wonderful features like the guided meditations, the forums, the timer itself works beautifully, I love getting gold stars for consecutive days and most especially  the world map showing who is meditating with me at any given moment.  I love this app!
reviews.author: Michael Reamy

reviews.comment: Excellent meditation timer. Effective without being disturbing. I also enjoy seeing how many other are meditating with me=
reviews.author: Marty Stahl

reviews.title: Register????
reviews.comment: Why do we have to register for this free app. I would have given this app 5 stars and now this. I don\'t think so...
reviews.author: Tamara Bauer

reviews.title: Very handy as portable meditation tool
reviews.comment: Like it..disappointed that they took multiple bells away unless you upgrade
reviews.author: Karen Windham

reviews.title: Excelente
reviews.comment: Muy buena aplicaci\303\263n. Te presenta todas las estadisticas de tu avance en la meditaci\303\263n.
reviews.author: Martin Solomiak

reviews.comment: Loving this app. It\'s been very helpful with my practice.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Kipp

reviews.title: Simple great application
reviews.comment: Downloaded it on my Galaxy S3, works great and has an excellent social aspect. Give it a try!
reviews.author: Jak Plihal

reviews.comment: Wonderful!  I use it everyday.  And the added bonus of being part of a global community is really very special, and has helped to deepen my practice.  Thank you!
reviews.author: Rory Anderson

reviews.comment: Fantastic
reviews.author: Jon Michael Schiavone

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Perfect app for meditation. Easy to use
reviews.author: Eddie Choy

reviews.title: Fantastic meditation timer app
reviews.comment: Great free app for guided and self meditation.  Love the simplicity and features. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Spenser Villwock

reviews.title: New update is annoying
reviews.comment: It was great when it was just the timer. The new update forces you to make an account and the whole app is laggy now.
reviews.author: Cliff Engle

reviews.title: Intrusive login ruins it
reviews.comment: This was a great, simple app with pleasant tone options that now requires an email address and login just to use. That is a load of bull****. I\'m so disappointed and annoyed.
reviews.author: Kyle Owens

reviews.title: Keep it simple
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my tablet unless its connected to wifi. I only get a blank screen. Worked fine until I paid for the full app...a waist of money.
reviews.author: De Williams

reviews.title: It WAS a great app...
reviews.comment: This was an elegant meditation timer I used regularly. However the latest update now requires signing up and logging in, severely undercutting ease of use. I\'m now seeking a new meditation timer app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Now a former user.
reviews.comment: I am now a former user of Insite Timer.  The login requirement and slooooooow response of the server has made this formerly perfect app so annoying as to be nearly useless.
reviews.author: Gordon Fink

reviews.title: No offline support?
reviews.comment: No offline support when you are abroad, so you can\'t use the app when ever you want.   Also there really should be an option to use your Google account to sign in.
reviews.author: Mille Barczyk

reviews.title: Force login
reviews.comment: Oops didn\'t read the reviews about the forced registration/login just to use this timer. Would almost certainly have registered for access to the community if I could also use the timer whenever and wherever without coercion. Uninstalling!
reviews.author: Sharon Willoughby
